card.name: Star Lead, Lord of Dragon Spirits

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your light creatures. Double Breaker When you put this creature into the battle zone or whenever it attacks, choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. Revolution 2 - If you have 2 or less shields, your opponent can only untap one of their creatures at the start of their turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your water creatures. Invasion - Water command(When one of your water commands attack, you may put this creature from your hand onto it) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw 4 cards. Then, your opponent chooses 2 cards from your hand at random and puts them on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your darkness creatures. ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Revolution 2 - Whenever this creature attacks, if you have 2 or less shields, destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your fire creatures. Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) Revolution 2 - When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 2 shields or less, choose any number of your opponent's creatures that have total cost 6 or less and destroy them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your fire creatures. Invasion - Fire command(When one of your fire commands attack, you may put this creature from your hand onto it) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Each of your fire creatures gets 'speed attacker'.(A creature that has 'speed attacker' doesn't get summoning sickness)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your nature creatures. Invasion - Nature Command(When one of your nature commands attack, you may put this creature from your hand onto it) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) After this creature attacks, you may return the top card of this creature from the battle zone to your hand.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you draw 2 cards. Then your opponent chooses 2 cards at random from your hand and puts them on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: This creature attacks each turn if able. This creature can't attack creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Dragon from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, each of your creatures gets the Guerrilla Command race until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, skip the rest of the turn.(Immediately start the next player's turn)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} Destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures. You may put a non-evolution creature that costs less than the destroyed creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ Shield trigger(When this Card Type is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may use it for no cost) Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. From among them, you may show a fire creature to your opponent and destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has that creatures power or less. Mana Arms 5: If you have 5 or more fire cards in your mana zone, add the revealed card to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take an evolution creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. This creature gets +3000 power for each evolution creature in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature or a creature that costs 7 or more into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 4000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. Then, you may put a creature that costs the same as that creature from your mana zone or graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, return all spells that have 'shield trigger' from your graveyard to your hand. Whenever your opponent uses a card that has 'shield trigger', you may use a card that has 'shield trigger' from your hand for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) >Whenever you put this creature into the battle zone or attacks, you may put any number of your shields into your graveyard. Then for each shield put into your graveyard, your opponent chooses one of his creatures and destroys it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) Power attacker(While attacking, this creature gets +5000 power) +5000 Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) Players can't put psychic creatures into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) This creature costs 1 less to summon for each Angel Command and Armored Dragon in your graveyard. It can't cost less than 2. Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) Power attacker +4000 ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields)

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever your opponent puts a creature into the battle zone, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge. If you win, put that creature into its owner's mana zone.(Gachinko Judge: Each player reveals the top card of their deck, then puts it on the bottom. You win if your card costs the same as or more than your opponent) Whenever your opponent casts a spell, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge. If you win, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} Each player puts all their creatures in the battle zone that cost the same as or more than the number of cards in their mana zones on the bottom of their decks.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your opponent attacks one of your fire Dragons, if you have no Batoraio Deluxe, Passion Reversal in the battle zone, you may put this creature from your hand into the battle zone. ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever one of your other fire creatures battles your opponent's creatures, you may have this creature battle instead. While battling, this creature gets +5000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) ​ {BLOCKER} Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) At the end of each of your turns, untap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of the following.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Power attacker +3000(While attacking, this creature gets +3000 power) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields)

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you don't have a water card in your mana zone, destroy this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each of your other Curry Breads gets +3000 power and breaks an additional shield.

card.name: Victorage Outlaw Cosmo Alchemy Kung Fu Horn Blues Cli Byte Hell Shen Gunman Gonbutreasure Friends Cross Robin Michaelan Global, Team Exile ~Katsudon and Friends~

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) While this creature is in your hand or battle zone, ignore all abilities of your exile creatures that would prevent your exile creatures from being put into the battle zone. Ultra Doron Go: When this creature leaves the battle zone, you may put an exile creature from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all other untapped creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If this is your only creature in the battle zone, it gets +2222 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your water creatures attacks, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your nature creatures attacks, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all your creatures except your dragons. Then, reveal cards from the top of your deck for each destroyed creature. Put all non-evolution dragons into the battle zone and the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Angel Commands. Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, break 2 of your opponent's shields. While you have 5 shields or more, your Light creatures don't leave the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you summon this creature into the battle zone, untap all your darkness and fire cards in your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Reveal one and put it into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If a fire or nature card was revealed in this way, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Revolution 2 - If you have 2 shields or less, look at the top card of your deck. You may put that card on the bottom of your deck. Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all dragons from among them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put a nature dragheart that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. Whenever you summon a creature or cast a spell, you may tap a light card, a water card, a darkness card, a fire card and a nature card in your mana zone instead of paying it's cost. ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) Power attacker(While attacking, this creature gets +5000 power) +5000 Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) Whenever this creature attacks, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge. If you win, take an extra turn after this one. (Gachinko Judge: Each player reveals the top card of their deck, then puts it on the bottom. You win if your card costs the same as or more than your opponent)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dragsolution: When the equipped creature would leave the battle zone by the effect of one of your opponent's spells or creature ability, flip this dragheart to the creature side and untap it instead. (At the start of your game, draghearts are put into your hyperspatial zone. If a creature equipped with it or the dragheart leaves the battle zone, return it there)

property.name: Rules
property.value: While battling, this creature gets +4000 power. ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) When you put this creature into the battle zone, if your opponent has a nature creature in the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. While your opponent has a water creature in the battle zone, this creature can't be blocked. While your opponent has a darkness creature in﻿ the battle zone, this creature gets 'slayer'. While your opponent has a light creature in the battle zone, at the end of each of your turns, you may untap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ Shield trigger(When this Card Type is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may use it for no cost) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return a light, darkness, fire, or nature card from your mana zone to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your nature creatures. ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) At the end of each of your turns, you may return a card from your mana zone to your hand.

card.name: Duel Jacker Shou, the Hot-Blooded Commentator

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, play Rock-Paper-Scissors with your opponent. If you win, this creature gets 'Speed attacker'. Whenever this creature battles, play Rock-Paper-Scissors with your opponent. If you win, this creature gets +6000 power until the end of the turn. If 'Duel Jacker Shou' is in the room, this creature gets +1000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Center God Link(When you put this creature or another God into the battle zone, you may unlink any number of your Gods. Then you may link this creature to a God that has 'Right God Link' and/or 'Left God Link') If this creature is linked as 3 cards, the linked god gets 'quattro breaker' and whenever your opponent would choose a creature, he can't choose this one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw 3 cards. Then put 2 cards from your hand on the top of your deck. Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of your opponent's creatures and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature would battle, you may play Rock-Paper-Scissors instead. The losing player destroys their creature that would have battled. Whenever your opponent throws rock during Rock-Paper-Scissors, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put any number of cards from your hand into your mana zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have 4 or more Wanwanwan, Wankorage in your deck. This creature gets +1111 power for each of your other Outrage Wankos in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your fire creatures. ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Revolution 2 - Whenever this creature attacks, if you have 2 shields or less, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 9000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent discards a card at random from his hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} Strike Back - Multicolored(When a multicolored card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may discard that card. If you do, summon this creature for no cost) Shield Go(When this creature is destroyed, put it face up into your shield zone. When this creature is face up and would leave your shield zone, put it into your graveyard instead) Ninja Strike 5(Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks or blocks, if you have 5 or more cards in your mana zone and if during that attack you didn't use a 'Ninja Strike' ability, you may summon this Shinobi for no cost. At the end of that turn, put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck)Lost Prism(When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a multicolored card, put it into your hand) Guardman(When one of your other creatures is attacked, you may tap this creature. If you do, the attacking creature will attack this creature instead) Power attacker +1000(While attacking, this creature gets +1000 power) Hunting(While battling, this creature gets +1000 power for each of your Hunters in the battle zone) Slayer(Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle) Escape(When this creature would be destroyed, you may add one of your shields to your hand instead. You can't use the 'shield trigger' ability of that shield) Dynamo(Whenever another Dynamo attacks or is attacked, you may tap this creature. If you do, add this creature's power and abilities to that creature until the end of the turn)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {BLOCKER} This creature can't attack. Awaken - At the start of your turn, you may put a non-evolution Great Mecha King or Machine Hero from your hand into the battle zone. If you do, flip this card. (At the start of your game, separate your psychic creatures from your deck and put them into your hyperspatial zone. If a psychic creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return it to your hyperspatial zone)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Each of your Great Mecha King and Machine Hero gets 'speed attacker' and +8000 power while battling. Release(When this creature would leave the battle zone, flip this creature to its lower cost side instead)

property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 9000 or less. If you have a creature that has 'Musha', 'Yamato' or 'Sword Flash' in its name in the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 12000 or less instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cross Gear While this card isn't crossed with a creature, your Dragon creatures may each cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1. The crossed creature gets +2000 power and breaks an additional shield. This card may be crossed with a creature that has 'Musha', 'Yamato' or 'Sword Flash' in its name for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) Tri God Link(Heavy, Dragon God) Right Side and(Metal, Dragon God) Left Side Whenever this creature attacks, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have less power than it. This creature breaks an additional shield for each card linked with it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your Gods may each cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less. Whenever one of your Gods are destroyed, return a God from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put up to 2 'Heavy, Dragon God', 'Metal, Dragon God' and/or 'Death, Destruction God' from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player puts all their cards in the battle zone, hand, shield zone and graveyard into their deck and shuffles it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Whenever you summon an evolution Phoenix, you may put it on top of creatures from your graveyard instead of creatures in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your creatures that has Dragon in its race is destroyed, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Angel Commands. Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) Players can't cast spells other than light spells. Non-light creatures are put into the battle zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw a card. Whenever you cast 'Holy Awe', you may summon an evolution creature that has 'Lord of Spirits' in its name from your hand for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put all non-light, non-evolution creatures in the battle zone into their owners' shields face down. Then for each creature put into the shields, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Demon Commands. Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all creatures except for darkness creatures. Then each player reveals his hand and discards all non-darkness cards from it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} Put the top 6 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then you may return a darkness creature and darkness evolution creature from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Samurai Generation(When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may generate a cross gear from your hand for no cost) You may cross your cross gear with this creature for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped) Put one of your creatures in the battle zone into your mana zone. Then put a creature that has 'Bolberg' in its name and a cross gear from your mana zone into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This cross gear is put into your mana zone tapped) Cross Gear(Put this card into the battle zone. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone) The crossed creature gets +3000 power. Whenever the crossed creature attacks, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your mana zone. Then return a card from your mana zone to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Cyber Viruses. ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature or another Cyber Virus into the battle zone, you may draw 3 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw 2 cards. Return all your opponent's creatures that have 'blocker' to their owners' hands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your cards in your mana zone, deck, graveyard and in the battle zone get the Phoenix race.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) Mana Galaxy Vortex evolution - Choose 3 creatures in your mana zone and put this creature into the battle zone on top of those creatures. ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Meteorburn - Whenever this creature attacks, you may put any number of cards under this creature into your graveyard. For each card put into your graveyard, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped) Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Add one of them to your shields face down, and put the other into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of your turn, draw an extra card. At the end of each of your turns, you may add a card from your hand into your shields face down. If you do, choose one of your shields and put it into your hand. You can't use the 'shield trigger' ability of that shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} Cast a spell that costs 7 or less from your graveyard for no cost. After you cast that spell, put it on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.). Speed attacker (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) While battling, this creature gets +4000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your fire creatures. Double breaker Revolution 2—If you have 2 shields or less, this creature gets +8000 power and triple breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker When you put this creature into the battle zone, if your opponent has 2 shields or less, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have blocker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your fire creatures. Triple breaker Revolution 2—If you have 2 shields or less, each of your other creatures in the battle zone break 2 additional shields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your water creatures. Invasion—Water command Double breaker When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent reveals the top 5 cards of their deck. Choose a spell from among them and put the rest onto the bottom of their deck. Cast that spell for no cost, then put it into your opponent's graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ Shield trigger Choose one of your opponent's cards in the battle zone that costs 5 or less and put it into its owner's graveyard. Mana Arms 7: If you have 7 or more fire cards in your mana zone, choose one of your opponent's cards in the battle zone that costs 12 or less and put it into its owner's graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your creatures that have Dragon in their race each cost 2 less to summon. (Dragonoids don't count.) They can't cost less than 2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ Shield trigger Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. You may may put an evolution creature from among the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of your game, include this card into the 5 cards in your hand. This impulse starts the game in the battle zone with 4 seals on it. This impulse can't leave the battle zone. Forbidden Liberate - When this impulse has no seals on it, flip it to its creature side. (When you seal a card, put the top card of your deck on that card face down. Whenever a Command is put into the battle zone, its owner puts a seal from one of his cards that has the same civilization as that Command into his graveyard. While a creature is sealed, both players ignore that creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double breaker When this creature Forbidden Liberates, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6666 or less. When this creature leaves the battle zone, your opponent chooses one of your shields. Put that shield into your graveyard. If this creature is anywhere other than the hand or battle zone, put it into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your fire creatures Invasion—Fire command Double breaker When this creature is destroyed, you may put one of the cards that was under it from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a nature dragheart that costs 4 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.) Cards in your mana zone are considered to be cards of every civilization. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: This turn, whenever any of your dragons attack, they get +10000 power and can't be destroyed while battling.
